Posts.Content: Lifestooshort1 wrote: Hi ladies....wow...i think i have a hernia.  Anyone else have that happen after DIEP surgery?  My surgery was in Sept 2007.  I thought that wasnt supposed to happen with DIEP....but more common with the older procedure of TRAM flap.  I need to see my doc...and from what I've read...have surgery to repair.  Does this never end? fran Fran- dx 8/06 ILC stage 3 1 node+ Mast/Chemo/Rads/DIEP Dx 8/9/2006, ILC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 1, 1/18 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 9/13/2006 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 9/26/2006 Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): DIEP flap, Nipple reconstruction, Tissue expander placement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Abdominal Hernia after DIEP? Lifestooshort1 swimangel72
